long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LaTeXGPT: Your Ultimate LaTeX Companion

Instantly Compile LaTeX Code to PDF or HTML without Leaving Your Favorite Websites
Are you tired of copying and pasting LaTeX code into various online editors just to see the final output? Do you wish for a seamless, efficient way to compile your LaTeX code right where you create it? Look no further ‚Äì LaTeXGPT is here to revolutionize your workflow!

Why Choose LaTeXGPT?
üöÄ Instant Compilation:
LaTeXGPT provides real-time compilation of LaTeX code directly within your browser. Whether you're working with ChatGPT, Gemini, GitHub, or any other website that includes LaTeX code, LaTeXGPT automatically adds a "Compile" button next to your LaTeX code. Simply click the button to get an instant PDF or HTML output without switching tabs or applications.

üîí Seamless Integration:
No more hassle of copying and pasting LaTeX code into different sites. LaTeXGPT integrates effortlessly into your workflow, allowing you to compile code on any website you are already using. This means you stay focused and efficient, with fewer distractions.

üíº Professional Outputs:
LaTeX is the gold standard for high-quality document preparation. With LaTeXGPT, you can create professional-grade PDFs or HTML files with ease. Perfect for academic papers, business reports, or any other document that demands excellence.

üéì Perfect for Students and Educators:
LaTeXGPT is an invaluable tool for students, educators, and researchers. Instantly see the results of your LaTeX code, making learning and teaching more effective and enjoyable. No more tedious back-and-forth between different tools.

üåê Versatile and Flexible:
Whether you're a mathematician, scientist, engineer, or writer, LaTeXGPT caters to your needs. From complex equations and graphs to beautifully formatted text, our extension handles it all.

‚öôÔ∏è User-Friendly Interface:
LaTeXGPT is designed with simplicity in mind. The intuitive interface ensures that even users new to LaTeX can start compiling code quickly and efficiently. Plus, our detailed documentation and support are there to help you every step of the way.

Features That Set Us Apart

Automatic "Compile" Button:
LaTeXGPT automatically adds a "Compile" button next to your LaTeX code. Just click the button to get an instant PDF or HTML output. No more waiting or guessing ‚Äì get immediate feedback and make adjustments on the fly.

Not Just Another JS LaTeX Compiler:
LaTeXGPT runs on a powerful LaTeX server, offering full support for all LaTeX features. It's not limited to basic functionalities like many JavaScript-based compilers.

PDF and HTML Outputs:
Choose between PDF and HTML output options. Customization options are coming soon, so stay tuned for more features!

High-Quality Rendering:
Our advanced rendering engine ensures that your PDFs and HTML files are of the highest quality, with crisp fonts and accurate layouts.

Security and Privacy:
LaTeXGPT generates public PDFs to provide a seamless experience without requiring sign-in or sign-up. These PDFs are accessible for a certain period before being automatically deleted, ensuring a balance between convenience and temporary accessibility.

Flexible Code Entry:
In addition to the automatic "Compile" button, users can also paste their desired LaTeX code into the extension's interface and compile it directly from there. This provides additional flexibility for various use cases.

Download LaTeXGPT now and experience the future of LaTeX compilation. Create stunning documents effortlessly and stay focused on what truly matters ‚Äì your work.

LaTeXGPT: Compile LaTeX from ChatGPT and More. Instantly. Seamlessly. Professionally.
